capwap-offload.help: Enable/disable offloading managed FortiAP and FortiLink CAPWAP sessions.
capwap-offload.name: capwap-offload

dedicated-management-affinity.help: Affinity setting for management deamons (hexadecimal value up to 256 bits in the format of xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx).
dedicated-management-affinity.name: dedicated-management-affinity

dedicated-management-cpu.help: Enable to dedicate one CPU for GUI and CLI connections when NPs are busy.
dedicated-management-cpu.name: dedicated-management-cpu

options.help: Enable dedication of CPU #0 for management tasks.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable dedication of CPU #0 for management tasks.
options.name: disable
